segments.title: Trace move onto playoffs after outliving Titan and Bilibili
segments.description: VCT China concluded the play-ins stage and Trace Esports came out on top.
segments.author: redlight

segments.title: Sentinels earn final Americas Kickoff slot
segments.description: Despite going 1-1, Sentinels got a convincing win against MIBR and a close loss to G2, getting the team a playoff spot in the Americas Kickoff due to map differential.
segments.author: weivy

segments.title: KCorp dominate EMEA Play-Ins
segments.description: KCorp defeated Vitality and KOI to reach the playoffs of EMEA Kickoff
segments.author: FerahgoTheGreat

segments.title: Trace, Titan, BLG win to advance to VCT China Kickoff play-ins
segments.description: Trace Esports,Titan Esports Club, BLG win to advance to VCT China Kickoff play-ins
segments.author: Paulwall918

segments.title: Sentinels, MIBR, G2 advance to Americas Kickoff play-ins
segments.description: Cloud9, KRÜ, and Leviatán are now out of Americas Kickoff, while today's winners will play for the final playoffs start
segments.author: PancakeGOAT

segments.title: FPX, DRG, and EDG make Kickoff playoffs
segments.description: Three teams scraped by to make the VCT China Kickoff playoffs.
segments.author: DavisEZ

segments.title: Team Vitality, KOI, and Karmine Corp qualify for EMEA Kickoff play-ins
segments.description: All three group deciders for the VCT 2024 EMEA Kickoff went to three maps, with both overtimes and steamrolls across the match day.
segments.author: weivy

segments.title: Gen.G continue streak to win Pacific Kickoff
segments.description: Gen.G continue upsets, now claiming Paper Rex's throne.
segments.author: thothgow

segments.title: Evil Geniuses debut with a 2-0 victory, move on to playoffs
segments.description: After a complete reconstruction, Evil Geniuses opened their 2024 season with a victory over G2 Esports and went on to the Kickoff playoffs.
segments.author: redlight

segments.title: Nova, JD survive elimination in VCT China Kickoff
segments.description: TYLOO and All Gamers are eliminated.
segments.author: tamagao

segments.title: Paper Rex, Gen.G clinch Madrid slot
segments.description: Titans rise and fall as Pacific's representatives for Madrid are set.
segments.author: TMosura

segments.title: FNATIC, NAVI inch closer to Madrid
segments.description: Two of EMEA's best are now one series away from going to Spain.
segments.author: thothgow

segments.title: NRG handle C9, LOUD survive Leviatán to qualify for playoffs
segments.description: Cloud9 and Leviatán will survive to play in their groups' decider matches, while NRG and LOUD will play next Saturday to qualify for Masters Madrid.
segments.author: PancakeGOAT

segments.title: Titan, DRG, and Wolves pick up wins in debut matches
segments.description: JDG, All Gamers, and BLG are left one game away from elimination.
segments.author: DavisEZ

segments.title: Heretics to playoffs; Giants eliminated in EMEA
segments.description: Heretics dominated KCorp to set up a top four Kickoff run
segments.author: FerahgoTheGreat

segments.title: Trace and FPX win first VCT China matches
segments.description: Trace, FPX barely break a sweat in the China Kickoff opening match.
segments.author: thothgow

segments.title: Gen.G defeat Team Secret and ZETA to make Pacific Kickoff playoffs
segments.description: After a nail-biting win over Team Secret and a clean sweep over ZETA, Gen.G locked their spot in the Pacific Kickoff playoffs.
segments.author: weivy

segments.title: Riot unveils VCT team capsules
segments.description: Team branded content is here for the Valorant Champions Tour.
segments.author: FerahgoTheGreat

segments.title: Heretics and KCorp open with wins in EMEA
segments.description: Heretics upset FUT despite a substitute player
segments.author: FerahgoTheGreat

segments.title: DRX go to playoffs, Secret and Talon set to rematch
segments.description: DRX advance to playoffs while DetonatioN continue without a match win since June 2022
segments.author: thothgow

segments.title: MIBR, Sentinels stay alive in VCT 2024 Americas Kickoff
segments.description: Four teams entered this day on the brink of elimination, but it was MIBR and Sentinels that won, eliminating FURIA and 100 Thieves from the Americas Kickoff.
segments.author: weivy

segments.title: paTiTek confirmed Heretics stand-in, RieNs to play from Istanbul
segments.description: paTiTek will play until Wo0t is of age; visa issues mean RieNs is forced to play remotely.
segments.author: thothgow

segments.title: PRX, Global Esports, T1 advance on day three of Pacific Kickoff group stage
segments.description: PRX advance on day three of Pacific Kickoff group stage
segments.author: Paulwall918

segments.title: G2 squeak out first VCT win over KRÜ in debut
segments.description: In the opening match of Group C, G2 Esports took down KRÜ Esports for their first VCT Americas victory.
segments.author: PancakeGOAT

segments.title: ZETA, Talon, DRX advance in Pacific Kickoff group stage
segments.description: ZETA beat Global, Talon upset Secret, DRX steamroll DetonatioN in day 2 of Pacific Kickoff
segments.author: thothgow

segments.title: Leviatán escape 100T
segments.description: A back and forth battle ended with a narrow victory for the international squad
segments.author: FerahgoTheGreat

segments.title: Korea draws first blood against APAC in Pacific Kickoff
segments.description: A battle between Korea and Asia-Pacific kicked off the start of VCT Pacific 2024.
segments.author: Seulgi

segments.title: LOUD shine in their heavyweight debut
segments.description: LOUD take down Sentinels in their debut without aspas
segments.author: FerahgoTheGreat

segments.title: Riot crowns Seoul as host city for Champions 2024
segments.description: Asia will be hosting its first Champions tournament.
segments.author: Seulgi

segments.title: NRG, Cloud9 start the 2024 Americas Kickoff strong
segments.description: On the first day of VCT 2024 action, the Americas Kickoff began with a superteam proving their worth, then a close win due to a rookie star performance.
segments.author: weivy
